actionable_tasks.title: Frontend UI Completion: Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Implement and finalize the Spotify OAuth authentication flow in the frontend, ensuring users can securely log in and connect their Spotify accounts.
implementation_steps: Review existing Spotify OAuth backend integration for endpoints and callback handling.
Design and implement the authentication button and modal in the UI.
Connect frontend logic to backend OAuth endpoints.
Test the flow with valid and invalid credentials.
Add error handling and user feedback for failed authentication.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number of automated tests for critical backend endpoints, focusing on provider switching and health metrics.
implementation_steps: Identify untested or minimally tested endpoints in provider and health modules.
Write new Jest test cases for edge scenarios (e.g., provider failover, error handling).
Run tests and verify coverage improvements.
Document new tests in the test suite README.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Quality Maintenance Scripts to CI Workflow
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate lint, security audit, and quality check scripts into the CI pipeline for automated code health monitoring.
implementation_steps: Update CI workflow YAML to run lint, security:audit, and quality:check scripts on push and PR events.
Ensure exit codes are handled for failed checks.
Test CI pipeline locally and with a test PR.
Document the workflow changes in project docs.

actionable_tasks.title: Dockerfile Optimization: Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor Dockerfiles for Node backend and React frontend to use multi-stage builds, reducing image size and improving build caching.
implementation_steps: Review current Dockerfiles for backend and frontend services.
Implement multi-stage build steps (build, test, production).
Test image builds locally and verify reduced image size.
Update docker-compose.yml if necessary.
Document build steps in README.

actionable_tasks.title: Backend: Add MongoDB TTL Index for Telemetry Data
actionable_tasks.description: Implement a TTL (Time-To-Live) index on MongoDB telemetry collections to automatically expire old data and optimize storage.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections requiring TTL index.
Add TTL index creation logic to initialization scripts.
Test index creation and data expiration locally.
Document TTL index configuration in backend docs.
